message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $180.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $180 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I can sell the product to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit too high. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can sell the product to you for $155.
I'm trying to get the best deal, but $155 is still a bit too high. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
